The letter and envelope were provided as: The spokesperson for Tim Burns shared a photograph of the letter and the envelope it arrived in, establishing its authenticity.
Email correspondence confirmed the authe: The spokesperson also provided email correspondence that verified the authenticity of the letter.
Social media posts by Tim Burns and Alys: Tim Burns tweeted a cropped photograph of the letter, underlining a specific section, while Alyssa Milano shared the letter on Twitter after obtaining permission from the Burns campaign.
Lack of response from other candidates: The letter was addressed to "Dear Wisconsin Judicial Candidate," implying that it was sent to all three candidates in the primary election. However, there was no response from the other two candidates, Rebecca Dallet and Michael Screnock, to confirm or deny the authenticity.
